title: Leftover resources on provisioning failure
body:
**Describe the bug**
Currently if the packer-provisioned machine fails to reach running state (for example because of capacity issues) it won't be cleaned up by the plugin. 
This unfortunately results in leaking resources that we need to clean up manually, which is not ideal.
